text: Harmesh Malhotra (14 June 1936 Khushab Pakistan – 22 November 2005) was an Indian film director, producer, and screenplay writer. ==Family== His daughter Payal Malhotra acted in films. == Filmography== As Director *Beti (1969) *Gaddaar (1973) Producer also *Patthar Aur Payal (1974) *Lafange (1975) Producer also *Sangram (1976) *Phaansi (1978) Producer also *Amar Shakti (1978) *Bagula Bhagat (1979) *Choron Ki Baaraat (1980) *Aapas Ki Baat (1981) *Raaz (1981) *Poonam (1981) *Mangal Pandey (1983) Producer also *Phaansi Ke Baad (1985) Producer also *Nagina (1986) Producer also *Khazana (1987) *Sherni (1988) *Dharam Shatru (1988) *Nigahen: Nagina Part II (1989) Producer also *Vidrohi (1990) *Amiri Garibi (1990) *Banjaran (1991) *Heer Ranjha (1992) Producer also *Cheetah (1994) *Paappi Devataa (1995) *Kismat (1995) *Tu Haseen Main Jawaan (1997) *Dulhe Raja (1998) Producer also *Akhiyon Se Goli Maare (2002) Producer also *Khullam Khulla Pyaar Karen (2005) As Writer (Screenplay ) *Nigahen: Nagina Part II (1989) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1936 births Category:2005 deaths Category:Hindi-language film directors Category:20th-century Indian film directors Category:21st-century Indian film directors Category:Hindi screenwriters Category:20th-century Indian screenwriters
